EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Events_Post-Event S1P Discount_Q316.Roadshow/DTF Post-Events S1P Discount i
EmailTemplate.subject: Special Discount to continue your Cloud Native Journey at SpringOne
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Register with your special “Cloud Native Roadshow” discount and save $600!
You have recently registered for one of our Cloud Native events and therefore we are giving you the opportunity to continue your Cloud Native journey with a special discount, allowing you to save $600 on your conference pass!
Register for SpringOne Platform today with your special discount code <[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]> “Pivotal-Roadshow-EMEA-1000”. Remember to also book your hotel room at the Aria <[[http://springoneplatform.io/travel]]>.
Join us for SpringOne Platform
SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process and tools for delivering and operating software services. If you are looking for training, technical deep dives or case studies, SpringOne Platform will have something for you. From the Cloud Native to those just starting to transform, there will be in-depth advanced technical topics and accessible introductory content covering agile, continuous delivery, devops, microservices, data analytics, machine learning, and more.
Aria Resort and Casino <[[https://www.aria.com/]]> 3730 S Las Vegas Blvd Las Vegas, NV 89158, United States [map <[[https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/ARIA+Resort+%26+Casino+Las+Vegas/@36.106659,-115.176909,16z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x80c8c42e1d156485:0x2ef3882f44b3056f?hl=en]]>] (702) 590-7111 <[[tel:17025907111]]>
Continue your Cloud Native Journey by joining the conversation at SpringOne Platform 2016!
Register Today! <[[http://info.pivotal.io/HI002000A0m06J00NhU00DC]]>
We hope to see you there,
The Pivotal <[[pivotal.io]]> team
